properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 130159Z DEC
   BY M/V RAMFORM VIKING TOWING 12 5100 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-55.14S 040-55.56W, 23-27.55S 040-39.40W,
   23-54.11S 041-41.37W, 23-21.22S 041-57.48W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 130259Z DEC 14.
